title: Google Assistant on Pixel 5
content:
Does anyone know how to set up the Beep or Sound that comes after you say Hey Google to your phone?
I’m using Pixel 5 and I can’t seem to find that toggle button to turn on that “beep” sound indicating that Google Assistant is listening after waking it up with the phrase “Hey Google or Okay Google. 

Thanks for the help
category: Google Assistant and Voice Actions, Google Pixel 5
